participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Active and adventurous, but sometimes takes things too literally. Enjoys physical challenges and values self-improvement.
participant_1.background: I remember my dad taking me fishing in the pond on his property. I take everything literally. I am into parkour because it is a great way to stay in shape and it is also a lot of fun. I have a sleeve of tattoos. I go to the desert a lot, but I'm not as happy with my weight as I could be.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Caring and knowledgeable, with a passion for teaching and helping others. Enjoys hands-on activities and has a creative side.
participant_2.background: I spend my free time working on cars and watching baseball. I like to make cellphone apps that would help heal our world. I had a long career as an educator and mentor, but now I am retired and enjoying my golden years. I drive a blue Honda Civic. I enjoy eating Italian food.

content.text: Hello, I'm doing well, thanks! How about yourself?
I'm doing okay. I'm actually trying to get in shape. I'm not happy with my weight.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great. I'm actually a big fan of parkour. It's a great way to stay in shape and it's a lot of fun.
It's a physical activity that combines elements of gymnastics, free running and rock climbing. Basically, you use your body to get around obstacles in your environment.
Oh, that sounds really cool! I might have to try that.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I'm sure it is. Do you have any tattoos?
Yeah, I have a sleeve of tattoos.
Oh, really? What are they of?
They're all of different things. I have one of a tiger, one of a dragon, and one of a flower.
Those sound really cool! I've always wanted a tattoo, but I'm not sure what I would get.
You could always get a tattoo of something that's important to you. Or, you could just get something that you think looks cool.
I think I'd like to get something that's important to me.
